title: Jikuu Bouken Nuumamonjaa (Chrono Trigger)
synopsis: It's the night before the fair celebrating the Kingdom of Guardia's one thousand year anniversary. When the humans have gone to sleep for the night, excited about the next day's celebration, the monsters come out to play.
staff: [['Kawasaki, Itsurou', ['Director']], ['Mitsuda, Yasunori', ['Music']], ['Asano, Kyouji', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Koyama, Masahiro', ['Key Animation']]]
